name: Dropped Marble
description:
Dropped Marble is a simple physics-based platformer that will test your skills. Push, spin,  jump, and fly your marble across moving, tilting, slippery and springy blocks to get to the golden finish. Once you've completed a course, master it and complete it in the fastest time possible.

If you need some competition, invite your friends to play with you over LAN (Hamachi works great) and see who wins! Or just sabotage each other, that's always fun too.

If platforming isn't your thing, try out the Hungry Marble modes, where you eat smaller balls to grow larger. But watch out! Other balls can and will eat you to grow themselves. It's great with friends or just single player.

If you enjoy the game and want to give any feedback or talk to me, join me in the game's discord server at https://discord.gg/VfacXv7p!
